sense.def: Alternative Writing 熱疿; Abbreviated Designation fei 痱 .

Pathological Condition of itchy millet size papules developing on the skin during summer months. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 6 Recipe Entry qiang wei wan 薔薇丸 , pills with qiang wei : 方治口瘡，身體有 熱氣痱瘰 , “A recipe to cure mouth sores, when the body has heat qi, seething rash , and scrofula”, Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry sheng ma 升麻 : 熱痱瘙癢，升麻煎湯飲，並洗 之 , “For heat with seething rash and itching, [have the patient] drink a decoction prepared from sheng ma , and also use this to wash [the afflicted body parts]”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 refers to re fei 熱痱 also as sao fei 瘙痱 , itching with seething rash ; fei chuang 痱瘡 , seething rash sores; fei zhen 痱疹 , seething rash papules; fei yang 痱癢 , seething rash with itching; fei zi 痱子 , seething rash seeds; fei bao 痱皰 , seething rash blisters.
